AwaisBajwa,

as I'm thinking about how one could add drag&drop support, I really think it should be done inside the TreeViewEx control itself and not be controlled from the outside by modified item controls. Alone for the visual feedback that should be given to the user. And inside the treeview control you'd have access to the actual item controls and their position and events. Adding item controls (instead of (view)model objects) to the items collection has already led to problems elsewhere.
